description: Five incarcerated women, each with a distinct criminal past and personality, navigate the cutthroat environment of Prison Hellion. Tiffany, a promiscuous former stripper and prostitute, uses her sexuality to get ahead. Abby, a rebellious tomboy, hides a submissive side. Melina, a ruthless ex-gang member, seeks dominance, particularly over Abby. Lydia, an anxious addict, is vulnerable and desperate. Kate, a cunning fraudster, manipulates others for her own amusement, fixating on Lydia.  Their interactions are marked by power struggles and sexual tension.
